ing: 1 (12 ounce) package silken tofu, cut into cubes, or to taste
des: "Silken tofu cubes blended with various fruits to create a delicious sweet summer drink. You can add more fresh or frozen fruit, if desired."
ins: Layer tofu, strawberries, and soy milk in a blender; blend. Add ice cubes, 1 cup at a time, while blender is running; blend until smooth.
